articles.title: No Time To Die slumps in the box office with $56m compared to $35m in the less COVID-restrictive UK - Daily Mail

articles.title: Wonka FIRST LOOK: Timothee Chalamet films Charlie And The Chocolate Factory prequel in Dorset - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actor, 25, could be seen sporting a purple coat and dark brown top hat as he filmed an outdoor scene for the prequel, simply called Wonka.
articles.content:
Timothee Chalamet looked well and truly in character as he filmed scenes for the new Willy Wonka film alongside co-stars Matt Lucas and Tom Davis at Lyme Regis in Dorset on Monday.
